Excerpt:: Sho Baraka is a hip-hop artist, activist, and writer. A graduate of Tuskegee University and the University of North Texas, Baraka is a cofounder of Forth District and the AND Campaign. He has also served as an adjunct professor at Wake Forest School of Divinity.

Excerpt:: American evangelicals have crafted their own historical narratives for many decades. The truth can be deeply disruptive. Dr. Du Mez is a history professor who studies the ways that politics, religion and gender intersect.
